vivae.ros.simulator.client.demo.agent

Class MyAgentControllingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.node.AbstractNodeMain
      • vivae.ros.simulator.client.impl.nodes.AgentSpawnClientNode
        • vivae.ros.simulator.client.impl.nodes.AgentControlClientNode
          • vivae.ros.simulator.client.demo.agent.MyAgentControllingClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ros.node.NodeListener, org.ros.node.NodeMain, AgentSpawningSynchronousClient, SynchornousClient

    public class MyAgentControllingClient
extends AgentControlClientNode
    This client is able to: -load map (on the simulatorServer) -spawn agent -connect to the agent over the ROS network -start the simulation -control the agent and read sensory data -stop the simulation To run this demo run: (may need to run ./gradlew installApp) -core: jroscore -SImulatorServer: cd vivae/vivaesimulator && ./vivae -This node: cd vivae/vivaesimulator && ./run vivae.ros.simulator.client.demo.agent.MyAgentControllingClient
